short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to override colors for common links and apply a common seven color pattern all color blind people can see effectively.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension to override colors for common links and apply a common seven color pattern all color blind people can see effectively.

Reference for seven color pallette can be found at http://mkweb.bcgsc.ca/colorblind/

It is recommended once installed to change this extension to "When you click on the extension" unless you want it to be applied to all websites.

Does not collect any data. This extension only layers over a website's CSS for links.
